title: Voter Referendums SCARE The GOP, IDGAF ABOUT THE QUEEN 09.14.22
itunes:title: Voter Referendums SCARE The GOP, IDGAF ABOUT THE QUEEN 09.14.22
description:
In episode 1330, Jack and Miles are joined by host of When The People Decide, Jenna Spinelle, to discuss… Michigan Ballot Referendum and the Importance of Text Kerning, Hannity: DEMS ARE OUT OF CONTROL LOOK AT ALL THESE CHARGES, The Soft Power Of Expecting You to Give A Shit About the Queen’s Death, The MTA Launches World’s Worst Covid Safety Poster and more! 

  1. Michigan Ballot Referendum and the Importance of Text Kerning
  2. 50 Million People Stuck In 'Modern Slavery': UN
  3. The MTA Launches World’s Worst Covid Safety Poster
  4. NY mask mandate lifted on subway and public transportation, Gov. Hochul announces
  5. Meet the Mask Force, the MTA’s way to get you to wear your damn mask
  6. Sign of the times? MTA removes COVID-era yellow subway mask posters
  7. No NYC Subway Riders Got Fined for Defying Mask Mandate in August
  8. MTA Will Spend $249M On New Cops to Save $200M on Fare Evasion
  9. New York Transit Agency Intentionally Slowing Buses to Punish Riders for Fare Evaders

LISTEN: Mercury by Steve Lacy

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
